Function reference

version 0.0.9.9002

Collapse, accordion, and accordion sidebar

All of these functions deal with collapsible elements. The foundation is the collapse element. Upon this we can build a set of accordion panels. For shiny apps, the accordion sidebar framework may be useful as it can give you another dimension with which to organize your ui.

  • Collapse: Demonstration, Boostrap reference
  • Accordion: Demonstration, Boostrap reference
  • Accordion sidebar: Demonstration

Create, append, and set options for an accordion-sidebar panel-group

  • bs_accordion_sidebar
  • bs_append.bsplus_accordion_sidebar
  • bs_set_opts.bsplus_accordion_sidebar
  • use_bs_accordion_sidebar

Create, append, and set options for an accordion panel-group

  • bs_accordion
  • bs_append.bsplus_accordion
  • bs_set_opts.bsplus_accordion

Create and attach a collapsible div

  • bs_attach_collapse
  • bs_collapse

Tooltips, popovers, and modals

Tooltips, popovers, and modals can be useful for including extra information.

  • Tooltips and popovers: Demonstration, Tooltip Bootstrap reference, Popover Bootstrap reference
  • Modals: Demonstration, Boostrap reference

Embed a popover into an html element

  • bs_embed_popover
  • use_bs_popover

Embed a tooltip into an html element

  • bs_embed_tooltip
  • use_bs_tooltip

Create and attach a modal window

  • bs_attach_modal
  • bs_modal
  • bs_modal_closebutton

Helpers

Sets Bootstrap data- and aria- attributes.

  • bs_set_aria
  • bs_set_data

Renders and returns an HTML fragment

  • render_html_fragment
